job.title: Engineering Coordinator
job.description:
• Responsibilities:Guide certification samples for UL, FCC etc through manufacturing and test processes
  • Work with cross functional groups (Engineering, Operations, Manufacturing)
  • Must be able to lift 50 lbs- our units are heavy and bulky
  • Coordinate prototype builds with local PCB and PCBA houses
  • Will create part numbers in PLM system for legacy products - ARENA preferred/highly desirable
  • Organize and manage engineering inventories for new product development projects
  • Track sample shipments and incoming material for traceability
  • Track QA inspections in spreadsheet and publish monthly so defect patterns are summarized
  • RMA of lab equipment as needed
  • Experience:Experience with PCBs and PCBAs,
  • Some work in the test and validation (highly desirable)
  • Familiar with PLMs systems – MS Office Suite (Excel)
  • Understands BOMs, ECO’s and part creation
  • Soft Skills:Self starter, eager, motivated and highly organized
  • Good command of English language
  • Attention to detail- has a sense of urgency
  • Comfortable in a high powered environment
  • Organize lab space- tidy work space expected, hands on and can keep a neatly organized work space
